original_text: and which now at his appointed season he has brought to light through the preaching entrusted to me by the command of God our Savior,
korean_text: 자기 때에 자기의 말씀을 전도로 나타내셨으니 이 전도는 우리 구주 하나님이 명하신 대로 내게 맡기신 것이라

sentences.original_text: and which now at his appointed season
through the preaching entrusted to me
by the command of God our Savior
